channel.title: Pm logs and chatlogs?
channel.description: I need help adding private message logs to my 317 server, Please i would be thankfull if you help me :D also, with adding chatlogs to it. i have tried using the search button but couldnt find it... if you could link me to a good tutorial, (besides jangans, because i have problems with his.. i added correct, but when someone says something in chat for example ":p" it says like... some weird thing like oe or something. :o anyhow, please if you could give me the codes to add, like a short tutorial, would be great! :D for chatlogs and pm logs plox? :P thankshh yooh haha
